summary: This Registration Rights Agreement dated November 17, 2025, is between Ondas Holdings Inc. and various Holders, outlining the rights for Holders to resell their securities. The agreement mandates Ondas to maintain an effective resale shelf registration statement and to file necessary supplements and amendments to ensure continuous effectiveness during the period until no registrable securities remain outstanding. If Ondas becomes ineligible to use the current registration form, it must promptly file a replacement and notify the Holders.

content.text: Does the 2022 private placement exemption under Reg D require investor verification beyond SEC Form 15c2-11? Show regulatory basis and case precedents
